sentences.sContent: Their farm has been reduced to half its former size.
sentences.sCn: 他们的农场已缩小到以前的一半。

sentences.sContent: Of the two possibilities, the former seems more likely.
sentences.sCn: 在这两种可能性中，前者似乎更有可能。

sentences.sContent: ...and that the former is a key risk factor for conditions such as heart disease...
...the former dean of students at Yale...
...I would like to choose the former one...
...It's not about making money for this former elementary school teacher...
...The author found a former Montessori teacher exercising strict control over her kids' screen time...
...She was a former Montessori teacher and amother of four...
...it is more reasonable to support the former opinion rather than the latter one...
...I had warned my former employer about my condition but it served little purpose...

synos.tran: 模型，样板；起形成作用的人

phrases.pCn: 成膜剂，成膜物；薄膜生成元素；薄膜形成器

remMethod.val: form(形成) ＋ er(表人、 物) → 已形成的东西 → 在前的

words.tran: 形成的；造型的；格式化的
没有形状的；无定形的；形体不明的
形式，形状；形态，外形；方式；表格
使正式；使有效（formalize的过去分词）；使定形；拘泥于形式
构成，组成；排列，组织；产生，塑造
使形式化；使正式；拘泥礼仪

trans.tranOther: happening or existing before, but not now
the first of two people or things that you have just mentioned
